title: Gu Family’s Wife - Novel Updates
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Family   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Love at First Sight   Marriage   Modern Day   Multiple Protagonists   Mysterious Family Background   Naive Protagonist   Polyandry   Reverse Harem   R*pe
author: 苏念
description:
The Gu family has always had the tradition of sharing wives, but it is not known to outsiders.

Su Nian, who is like a white rabbit, married into the Gu family happily and became the second young lady of the Gu family. But waiting for her was three wolf like men.>
